Method Detail

register

void register(edu.umflix.model.User user)
              throws InvalidEmailException,
                     InvalidPasswordException,
                     InvalidRoleException
Registers a new user into the system

Parameters:
user - the user to register
Throws:
InvalidEmailException - thrown if the email is not valid
InvalidPasswordException - thrown if the password is not valid
InvalidRoleException - thrown if the role is not valid

login

java.lang.String login(edu.umflix.model.User user)
                       throws InvalidUserException
Logs a user into the system

Parameters:
user - the user to log
Returns:
the token of the session
Throws:
InvalidUserException - thrown if the user is not registered into the system

delete

void delete(java.lang.String token,
            edu.umflix.model.User user)
            throws InvalidUserException,
                   PermissionDeniedException,
                   edu.umflix.authenticationhandler.exceptions.InvalidTokenException
Deletes a user from the system

Parameters:
token - the token of the session
user - the user that needs to be deleted
Throws:
InvalidUserException - thrown if the user is not registered into the system
PermissionDeniedException - thrown if the user that corresponds to the token is not allowed to remove the user
edu.umflix.authenticationhandler.exceptions.InvalidTokenException - thrown if the token is not a valid one

update

void update(java.lang.String token,
            edu.umflix.model.User user,
            java.lang.String newPassword)
            throws InvalidUserException,
                   PermissionDeniedException,
                   InvalidPasswordException,
                   edu.umflix.authenticationhandler.exceptions.InvalidTokenException
Updates the password of a user

Parameters:
token - the token of the session
user - the user that needs it's password updated
newPassword - the new password
Throws:
InvalidUserException - thrown if the user is not registered into the system
PermissionDeniedException - thrown if the user that corresponds to the token is not allowed to do this action
InvalidPasswordException - thrown if the newPassword is not a valid one
edu.umflix.authenticationhandler.exceptions.InvalidTokenException - thrown if the token is not a valid one
